Movie & Dining: Get 20% off up to Rs. 500 on dining
Rewards Rate: 5% cashback on all spends via Freecharge and 1% cashback on all other spends.
Reward Redemption: Edge Reward Points can be redeemed against various products at a rate of 1 RP = Re. 0.20.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on spending Rs. 50,000 or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount or Rs. 500 (whichever is higher)

product_details: Unlimited 5% cash back on all your Freecharge spends.
Spend-based waiver of the renewal fee.
1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions.
